user_data.target_needs: I wanted to fulfill the need for comfortable, breathable underwear that provides all-day comfort and value.
purchase_reason: I was looking for comfortable underwear that would keep me cool and dry throughout the day. The key attributes of the product, such as the soft fabric and tagless design, appealed to my need for all-day comfort. The positive review highlighted the comfort aspect, which reinforced my decision to purchase.

I needed breathable and soft underwear that would provide comfort and value. The product description emphasized the breathable micro-mesh fabric and comfort features, which aligned with my desire for quality and comfort. The review confirmed that it met my expectations for being soft and great value.

I wanted a basic yet comfortable underwear option that would feel soft against my skin. The description's focus on softness and durability was appealing, and the review reassured me of its comfort and breathability, which were my primary concerns.
user_data.general_preference: I generally prefer products that prioritize comfort and support, particularly in undergarments. I value features such as wire-free designs, cushioned straps, and moisture-wicking materials that enhance comfort throughout the day. Aesthetically, I appreciate elegant designs and colors that add a touch of femininity without compromising on functionality. Additionally, I tend to favor items that are easy to care for and maintain their quality over time. On the other hand, I dislike products that have underwires or uncomfortable seams that can dig into the skin, as well as those that do not provide adequate support or fit. Overall, my preferences lean towards comfortable, stylish, and well-constructed items that offer good value for money.

conversation.content: I want comfortable, breathable underwear for all-day comfort and value. within my expected price range: [18.97, 29.48]
What specific size or fit do you prefer in your underwear?
I prefer underwear that offers a comfortable and supportive fit without any restrictive elements like underwires.
